channel.title: Need help [317 PI]
channel.description:
I'm currently having issues creating a Dialogue with my 317 PI server. I have read many tutorials and even tried to use Dialogue Creation Tools but none of them get me the results I want, and none of the tutorials are getting through to me.
Can someone explain to me how to get this Dialogue working? (I do not need the coords for the locations, i just need an understanding on how i would get this to work.) [img]http://i1295.photobucket.com/albums/b622/im4ever12c/Untitled_zps77ee02b3.png[/img]

item.title: Need help [317 PI]
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

This might look hard, but it really is not. Let me give you an example.

1 second. I will edit this.

Alright, the dialogue is self-explanatory I guess. you get 4 options ok.

Then you will have to search the cases of the options. and the most important thing. you would have to make an int so you can seperate options. i.e;
you want to do something on case 9169. but there’s already done something there. then you could seperate it by doing this

[code] case 9158:
c.sendMessage(“You teleport to the Clan Wars minigame.”);
c.teleportToX = 2589;
c.teleportToY = 9423;
Option = 1;

		c.heightLevel = 0;
                c.RemoveAllWindows();
                c.RemoveAllWindows();
            } else {

//do stuff
Option = 2;
break;[/code]

Alright. That’s one thing.

The thing you are planning doing isn’t much harder. you could do something like this:

[code]

case 9159: (the case of the dialogue. make sure to check what it is)

            selectoption(
                    "@dre@Where would you like to go?",
                    "Monsters",
					"Bosses",
					"Mini-Games",
                    "Pking", "");

Option = 3;
break;[/code]

and of those 4 options you could make many more options and eventually a teleport. It’s really easy.

Read full topic
